Class Retailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.freeiz.ucftxts.client.Retailer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Retailer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Michael Scherer Class containing all the information about a given retailer, the price that they offer, their location
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
